qa.name: Amelia
qa.appearance: Petite with round glasses and messy hair

hf.name: Marcus
hf.appearance: Tall with a slight limp and piercing blue eyes

tr.name: Grandmother Rose
tr.appearance: Frail with wrinkled hands and kind eyes

json_to_edit.voice_over: The pages whispered secrets long forgotten, unraveling a past I never knew existed.
json_to_edit.description: Amelia discovers a mysterious talking book that reveals her family's hidden history.
json_to_edit.location: Dusty attic of an old Victorian house
json_to_edit.lighting: Soft, golden light filtering through a small window
json_to_edit.name: Whispering Pages
json_to_edit.scene_summary: Amelia uncovers a magical talking book that reveals her family's forgotten past, leading to surprising revelations.

qa.action: Amelia enters the cluttered attic, sunlight streaming through a small window.

hf.action: The mysterious book opens on its own, revealing glowing text.

tr.action: Amelia's eyes widen in shock as she listens to the book's revelations.

xc.action: Marcus enters the attic, looking concerned and intrigued.

ka.action: Amelia and Marcus huddle over the book, discussing its contents in hushed tones.

fn.sfx_keywords: sharp intake of breath, book pages turning
fn.action: The book reveals a photo of young Grandmother Rose, shocking Amelia.

af.action: Grandmother Rose enters, smiling knowingly at the scene before her.

edit_command: Rearrange the order of shots to: 4, 1, 7, 2, 5, 3, 6. Don't change anything else.

label.rationale:
we need to rearrange the order of shots as requested by the director without changing any other content. this involves updating the "list_display_order" field in the "shots" object to reflect the new order. the new order will be:

1. shot 4 (xc)
2. shot 1 (qa)
3. shot 7 (af)
4. shot 2 (hf)
5. shot 5 (ka)
6. shot 3 (tr)
7. shot 6 (fn)

we'll update the "list_display_order" field accordingly while keeping all other information in the json unchanged.
